snippet: The former governor of South Carolina, Mark Sanford, whose political career seemed over after an extramarital affair, was elected to the same Congressional seat he previously held.
abstract: Mark Sanford, former Republican governor of South Carolina whose political career seemed over after extramarital affair, is elected to same Congressional seat he previously held; defeats Democratic opponent Elizabeth Colbert Busch.
lead_paragraph: The former governor of South Carolina, Mark Sanford, whose political career seemed over after an extramarital affair, was elected to the same Congressional seat he previously held.

headline.seo: South Carolina Returns Mark Sanford to Office
headline.main: Looking Past Sex Scandal, South Carolina Returns Ex-Governor to Congress
headline.print_headline: Looking Past Sex Scandal, South Carolina Returns Ex-Governor to Congress
